scripts.build: yarn build:types && yarn build:es && yarn build:cjs
scripts.build:es: rimraf dist/es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel src --extensions .ts,.tsx,.js  --ignore "**/*.test.js","**/test.js" --out-dir dist/es
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf dist/cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --extensions .ts,.tsx,.js --out-dir dist/cjs
scripts.build:types: rimraf dist/types && tsc -p tsconfig.json -d --outDir dist/types  && rimraf dist/types/**/*.js
scripts.format: yarn format:src && yarn format:cjs && yarn format:es
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn lint && yarn build && rimraf dist/**/*.test.js && rimraf dist/**/test.js && yarn format
scripts.validate: yarn check-types && yarn lint && yarn test && yarn format:src
